summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2115, for the improvement of North and West 77th Street from Greenwood Avenue to 8th Avenue Northwest; and 1st Avenue Northwest from West 74th Street to West 80th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21209 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
